comments.text: It seems that nobody has a use for (well, Canvas does not use) JOIN_MITER as defined by Direct2D - JOIN_MITER_OR_BEVEL is all that's used. We should probably remove JOIN_MITER in favour of JOIN_MITER_OR_BEVEL and/or change the meaning of JOIN_MITER to JOIN_MITER_OR_BEVEL and then remove the latter.
